message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your enthusiasm.  $110 is a bit more than I'd like to pay right now. Would you consider $105?  I'm really interested in this product, and I think we can find a price that works for both of us.
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I can do $108, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. I really think you'll love this product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
